ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Exp & Seb question -- Shrooms!
ygData.msgSnippet: Some lessons about the shrooms... they seem to pop up when you have been fighting at the zone for a long time. Like when you are waiting for the last team
ygData.messageBody:
Some lessons about the shrooms... they seem to pop up when you have been
fighting at the zone for a long time. Like when you are waiting for the last
team member to arrive. We used to just join up and head in at this point and
always ran into a shroom train. Now we camp out (EVERYBODY thx bard agro
transfer) right before going in and voila, havent seen a shroom since (well
till we went actively looking for them anyways :)

Note the above info might be pure bull sheet and just random luck on our
part... hardly scientific :)

And 54 sucks. Mah god it was painful. Finally made 55 and lemme tell you, i
woulda rather gone through 51-53 again than 54. Though the new xp patch
helped a ton, before it was just too painful to contemplate. Anyways 55
seems to be a lot easier, i am already half a bubble into it after just a
few hours pulling like mad in skyfire with a rogue/necro to back me up :)

Gendal Concorden, lvl 55 Bard of Talisman, Tunare.
----- Original Message -----
From: "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" <garramone@...>
To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
Sent: Thursday, May 25, 2000 11:32 AM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Exp & Seb question -- was Re: AC


> that's not bad in a group with everyone higher level than you. i think
> before the patch it took me about 4 hours to get half a bubble, and the
> other night i got 3/4 bubb in the same time. but now in 54 it is just
> extremely slow, worse than 51.
>
> Shada Powa, L54 Wood Elf Minstrel
> Tyria Sarkin, L50 High Elf Wizard
> <Afterlife> Mithaniel Marr Server
>
>
> > Compared to what it was - yes, I guess so but I spent 8 hours
> > yesterday in
> > Sebilis with a full group (granted there were 2 54's, another
> > who became 54,
> > 1 53, 1 52 and me 51) for 1 bubble of exp. (sigh)
>
